title: College Football Playoff Selection and Sport MegaDeals
itunes:title: College Football Playoff Selection and Sport MegaDeals
description:
Scarlet Fu, Mike Lynch and Damien Sassower speak with Mike Aresco, the commissioner of the American Athletic Conference. The conversation touches on the College Football Playoffs and Name, Image and Likeness laws. All that and more in this weekend edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
